Name: Poly Mole
About the game: Poly Mole is a puzzle game in which you have to guide your mole through a ton of different levels. Play levels from the community, create your own or test yourself in the campaign. Campaign Discover up to 50 levels which get harder and harder along the way. Even the smartest among you will have a hard time. There are also a lot of accessories hidden in the world of Poly Mole which you can collect to customize your own mole. Community Try the levels of the community and show them how good you are! Maybe it won't be that easy after all. The community doesn't hold back and will give you an even harder time. Editor Create your own levels and share them with the community. There are no limits!

Meta Description: Looking for information on Poly Mole? Check out the release date (Jul 12, 2019), developer insights from Haubna, and a complete game summary.
